text: Heavenly Sword is a 2007 action-adventure hack and slash video game for PlayStation 3. Developed by Ninja Theory (developer of Ninja Gaiden series) and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. ==Gameplay== Gameplay of Heavenly Sword is similar to God of War series, which is using quick time event (QTE) and using hack and slash like Devil May Cry series.
